_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Smalland: Survive the Wilds
author: imkringle@proton.me
description: Smalland: Survive the Wilds is a big adventure on a tiny scale! Enjoy multiplayer survival in a vast, hazardous world. Preparation is key when you're this small, surrounded by massive creatures & at the bottom of the food chain. Craft weapons & armour, build encampments & explore a strange new land.

installation.script:
#
# Smalland Install script
#
apt -y update
apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install unzip
dlurl="https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/npnfynj1de24gmid2b4v6/h/SMALLANDDedicatedServer_Linux.zip?rlkey=5yqehd802qy0hbsmvl59zdlme&dl=1"

#Download Files
mkdir -p /mnt/server/temp/
cd /mnt/server/temp/
echo "Downloading files from Dropbox"
curl -sSL -o SMALLANDDedicatedServer_Linux.zip $dlurl/SMALLANDDedicatedServer_Linux.zip
unzip -o SMALLANDDedicatedServer_Linux.zip

#Movin
cp -r /mnt/server/temp/SMALLANDDedicatedServer_Linux/* /mnt/server/
cd /mnt/server
rm -R /mnt/server/temp/
chmod -R 755 *

echo "---------------------"
echo "Installation Finished"
echo "---------------------"
